entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hopewell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 02:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 early this evening then becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the morning then to snow mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
